evidence.claim: NeuroCare.AI utilizes AWS services for scalable cloud infrastructure.
The platform supports FHIR standards to ensure interoperability with EHR systems.
NeuroCare.AI mentions HIPAA compliance on their security page, underlining their commitment to healthcare data privacy.
The company implements X12 transaction sets for health insurance claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in X12 transactions and API integrations for healthcare data exchange.
